description:
Low level disk editor for hard disks

Active@ Disk Editor is an advanced tool for viewing and editing of raw data
(sectors) on physical hard disks.

Inspect file structures and edit data directly in volumes, partitions and files
with integrated support of MBR, GPT, NTFS, FAT, exFAT, HFS+, ext2, ext3, ext4,
UFS and LDM structures.

Various colorful structure templates ease data inspection and navigation. As you
edit data in Hex, ASCII or Unicode pane or in Templates window, modified data is
fully synchronized between views.
- New: Apple macOS platform is now supported
- New: Disk explorer presented disks in partitioned layout
- New: Disk management allows to create, format and edit partitions
- New: Disk rollback allows to backup (save) disk partitioning actions and restore it to stored stage
- New: Bulk data transfer to export (save) and import big data chunks
- Improved editing experience and navigation
- Improved data interpreter, search and bookmarks handling
- More file system templates. Context editing template field values
- Enhanced editor layout and customization options
- Bug fixes and performance improvements
- Latest kernel including bug fixes and improvements
